display_long_description:
Built using real scientific 3D research data, 10k Science is a journey from everyday life into microscopic worlds that are invisible all around us.

# Experience real science!

🧬 Discover and see the CRISPR treatment for sickle cell disease.

🍕 Zoom into a soda and pizza to see what's it's made out of!

🥀  Investigate how a microscopic insect is causing a vineyard's plants to wilt.

An AI assistant guides you with live audio interactions and gives real-time personalized responses based on your answers.

# Subscribe to unlock more experiences:

🕷️ Find out how tarantula toxins can function as pain medicine

🔥 Track how air quality changed during the Jan 2025 LA wildfires

🐬 Learn how dolphins use their ears to see underwater

And much more to come!

Our ever-expanding library showcases new science experiences based on research from scientists at Cambridge, UC Berkeley, UC Davis, and others. 


**FOR INDIVIDUAL AND EVALUATION USE ONLY - Educational institutions and other organizations please contact us for more info!** 

# Educator Features:

✏️ Customizable AI guides

💻 Web-based Educator Dashboard to monitor student progress and thought process

📖 Supplemental NGSS-aligned curriculum and activities developed by the Lawrence Hall of Science.

Contact us at info@dynamoid.com for licensing information and a demo of the Educator platform!
